modular.title: Modular
modular.description: siimple has been built using SASS/SCSS mixins. Just import only what you need!

responsive.title: Responsive
responsive.description: siimple allows you to design a web page that looks great on all devices (desktops, tablets and phones).

elegant.title: Elegant
elegant.description: siimple combines an elegant, modern, flat and minimalistic design.
